humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, a single out of two sentinel lymph nodes is positive for micrometastasis (AJCC pN1mi(sn)). This corresponds to N1 as per the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 1 out of 2 sentinel lymph nodes positive for micrometastasis, with the largest metastasis measuring 1.0 mm. This meets the criteria for AJCC pN1mi(sn), which corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage. The substaging information (mi) can be ignored for this question.
